from_address: "Unlimited Internet Music and Movie Download Center" <q-pdi9zmi@recordseparate.com>
subject: Legally download music and movies onto your PC
body:
We would like to inform that you can easily download your favorite songs, movies, and even games, onto your PC and laptop so you can begin listening to and watching them right away! 
Press here for the simple PC and LAPTOP instructions:

http://assumsnap.com/t/q-pdi9zmi/297226

The music and movie studios DO NOT want you to know about us, but there is nothing they can do about it!
Finally, we would like to inform that you can easily backup your DVD movie collection to the same inexpensive CDs you\u2019ve used to copy music. Now there\u2019s no need to go out and purchase an expensive DVD burner or expensive blank DVDs. Nothing could be easier!
Press here for the simple instructions:

http://assumsnap.com/t/q-pdi9zmi/297226
